INSERT /*MS-YRD-F-INVESTIGATION-UNDERWRITING-INSERT*/ INTO f_investigation_underwriting(form_id,project_code,project_name,customer_id,customer_name,project_source,project_gist,financing_amount,demand_date,setup_date,issue_date,collect_scale,time_limit,time_unit,total_cost,issue_rate,has_credit,exchange_id,exchange_name,charge_rate,charge_unit,law_office_rate,law_office_unit,club_rate,club_unit,other_rate,other_unit,underwriting_rate,underwriting_unit,charge_way,balance,intro,raw_add_time) VALUES (#formId#, #projectCode#, #projectName#, #customerId#, #customerName#, #projectSource#, #projectGist#, #financingAmount.cent#, #demandDate#, #setupDate#, #issueDate#, #collectScale.cent#, #timeLimit#, #timeUnit#, #totalCost#, #issueRate#, #hasCredit#, #exchangeId#, #exchangeName#, #chargeRate#, #chargeUnit#, #lawOfficeRate#, #lawOfficeUnit#, #clubRate#, #clubUnit#, #otherRate#, #otherUnit#, #underwritingRate#, #underwritingUnit#, #chargeWay#, #balance.cent#, #intro#, #rawAddTime#)
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
sqlMap.update: update /*MS-YRD-F-INVESTIGATION-UNDERWRITING-UPDATE*/ f_investigation_underwriting set form_id=#formId#, project_code=#projectCode#, project_name=#projectName#, customer_id=#customerId#, customer_name=#customerName#, project_source=#projectSource#, project_gist=#projectGist#, financing_amount=#financingAmount.cent#, demand_date=#demandDate#, setup_date=#setupDate#, issue_date=#issueDate#, collect_scale=#collectScale.cent#, time_limit=#timeLimit#, time_unit=#timeUnit#, total_cost=#totalCost#, issue_rate=#issueRate#, has_credit=#hasCredit#, exchange_id=#exchangeId#, exchange_name=#exchangeName#, charge_rate=#chargeRate#, charge_unit=#chargeUnit#, law_office_rate=#lawOfficeRate#, law_office_unit=#lawOfficeUnit#, club_rate=#clubRate#, club_unit=#clubUnit#, other_rate=#otherRate#, other_unit=#otherUnit#, underwriting_rate=#underwritingRate#, underwriting_unit=#underwritingUnit#, charge_way=#chargeWay#, balance=#balance.cent#, intro=#intro# where (underwriting_id = #underwritingId#)

update /*MS-YRD-F-INVESTIGATION-UNDERWRITING-UPDATE-BY-FORM-ID*/ f_investigation_underwriting set project_code=#projectCode#, project_name=#projectName#, customer_id=#customerId#, customer_name=#customerName#, project_source=#projectSource#, project_gist=#projectGist#, financing_amount=#financingAmount.cent#, demand_date=#demandDate#, setup_date=#setupDate#, issue_date=#issueDate#, collect_scale=#collectScale.cent#, time_limit=#timeLimit#, time_unit=#timeUnit#, total_cost=#totalCost#, issue_rate=#issueRate#, has_credit=#hasCredit#, exchange_id=#exchangeId#, exchange_name=#exchangeName#, charge_rate=#chargeRate#, charge_unit=#chargeUnit#, law_office_rate=#lawOfficeRate#, law_office_unit=#lawOfficeUnit#, club_rate=#clubRate#, club_unit=#clubUnit#, other_rate=#otherRate#, other_unit=#otherUnit#, underwriting_rate=#underwritingRate#, underwriting_unit=#underwritingUnit#, charge_way=#chargeWay#, balance=#balance.cent#, intro=#intro# where (form_id = #formId#)

update /*MS-YRD-F-INVESTIGATION-UNDERWRITING-UPDATE-PROJECT-CODE*/ f_investigation_underwriting set form_id=#formId#, project_name=#projectName#, customer_id=#customerId#, customer_name=#customerName#, project_source=#projectSource#, project_gist=#projectGist#, financing_amount=#financingAmount.cent#, demand_date=#demandDate#, setup_date=#setupDate#, issue_date=#issueDate#, collect_scale=#collectScale.cent#, time_limit=#timeLimit#, time_unit=#timeUnit#, total_cost=#totalCost#, issue_rate=#issueRate#, has_credit=#hasCredit#, exchange_id=#exchangeId#, exchange_name=#exchangeName#, charge_rate=#chargeRate#, charge_unit=#chargeUnit#, law_office_rate=#lawOfficeRate#, law_office_unit=#lawOfficeUnit#, club_rate=#clubRate#, club_unit=#clubUnit#, other_rate=#otherRate#, other_unit=#otherUnit#, underwriting_rate=#underwritingRate#, underwriting_unit=#underwritingUnit#, charge_way=#chargeWay#, balance=#balance.cent#, intro=#intro# where (project_code = #projectCode#)
